item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tahera-firdose/ Medium: https://medium.com/@tahera-firdose GitHub: https://github.com/taherafirdose

item.title: Tahera Firdose
item.description: Hi, I’m Tahera, a passionate data explorer with a Postgraduate Diploma in Artificial Intelligence. My journey blends the art of storytelling with the intricacies of AI and data science, a skill honed through my role as a technical writer on Medium, where I transform complex concepts into engaging stories. Driven by insatiable curiosity and continuous learning, I excel in turning data into a canvas of creativity and logic. Eager to apply my skills in challenging roles, I am ready to contribute to meaningful data science projects, leveraging my passion for data to create positive, impactful solutions.
